snippet.title: Pixel Privateers Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Pixel Privateers is a Squad Based Tactical RPG “Loot ‘Em Up” that will send your team of mercenaries through a mysterious wormhole on a quest to gather technology for your employer. In a twist of fate, your journey becomes a one-way ticket – with an entire galaxy of worlds to explore, factions to encounter, and epic gear to collect.

Available 2/21/2017

Follow Game on Twitter: https://twitter.com/PixelPrivateers
Join Community At: http://quadrodelta.com/forum/
Steam Page: http://store.steampowered.com/app/342640
